entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @shearm @LisaForgang @realDonaldTrump Management 101 - to solve a hard problem find someone who has already solved the problem & replicate their SYSTEM. The numbers speak for themselves. I sent to national #COVID19 task force in March (Singapore). No reply. Now Taiwan is model. https://t.co/zLBAZg4YRQ
